info.name: sanrio animated discord
info.description: this works!! pink sanrio my melody theme
info.additionalInfo:
!!PLEASE READ IF YOU ARE TRYING TO MAKE YOUR OWN THEME!!

THIS 100% WORKS!

where most people go wrong while making themes is the link and or the color. if you copy the CSS, you must put in  a valid image link. also, when you go down to the RGBA, leave the last single digit as 5 or 6 or the last number. then put go to https://www.rapidtables.com/web/color/RGB_Color.html to get colors. if you dont want it pink, then you may change it. make sure you have a nice, dark background and then change the color to a lighter one. you may watch a tutorial on youtube to learn how to use java/css and how to use the RGB. copy the three 3 digit numbers that are vertically stacked. one on top is first and then on. when you copy the image link, be sure to not delete anything, keep the (). just delete what's inside and replace. if it doesn't work, for example, you have a yellow image and its pink, then you have done the RGBA/hex wrong. it will look like this. ' rgba(225, 225, 225, .6); ' leave the 6 as it is. go to the hex generator. change the first 3 groups of numbers. make sure its a yellow code. if they are all the same, thats fine! it's so easy and simple! all u have to do is change the hex to a ligher color and then change the backround url. u only have to change the hex color code once! I hope this helped. if you need any further help, feel free to contact me or friend me on discord (tag is 
eve Ñ¼#0103 ) be sure to tell me tho!
